DOC.brief_summary: This two-stage study . In first stage , 30 subject stroke ( onset > 2 week ) recruit , assess record clinical characteristic , sympathetic nerve testing , twice symptom-limit exercise capacity test . The second stage would recruit 90 subject stroke ( onset > 2 week ) , randomize one three group ( control , low-intensity , high-intensity ) . They evaluate four-week interval clinical characteristic twice symptom-limit exercise capacity test ( baseline four-week training ) .
DOC.brief_title: Early Intervention With Low-intensity Leg Cycling Exercise Program Individuals After Stroke
DOC.detailed_description: This two-stage study . In first stage , 30 subject stroke ( onset > 2 week ) recruit , assess record sympathetic nerve testing , anthropometry , twice symptom-limit exercise capacity tests.The second stage would recruit 90 subject stroke ( onset > 2 week ) , randomize one three group . The control group undergo traditional rehabilitation , The low-intensity exercise group receive low-intensity four-week cycle ergometry traditional rehabilitation . The The high-intensity exercise group get high-intensity four-week cycle ergometry traditional rehabilitation . They evaluate sympathetic test , anthropometry , functional scale activity questionnaire , symptom-limit exercise capacity test four-week training .
DOC.criteria: stroke onset longer two week , eligible exercise test Doctor aphasia , apraxia
